childNode.name: management
childNode.description: The management component of the application process

childNode.name: naming
childNode.description: The naming information of this application process (name, synonyms, whatevercast)

childNode.name: applicationprocessname
childNode.description: The name of the application process

childNode.name: currentsynonym
childNode.description: The current synonym of the application process names, i.e. its address

childNode.name: synonyms
childNode.description: All the synonyms of the application process name

childNode.name: whatevercast
childNode.description: The whatevercast names that the application process knows about

childNode.name: enrollment
childNode.description: All the enrollment information (names of the members of the DIF and their addresses?)

childNode.name: operationalstatus
childNode.description: The operational status of the application process
